properties.Name: Facility
properties.Description:
A complex of buildings, equipment and supporting assets that fulfills a specific function or operation.

Note:
A facility is an above ground infrastructure associated with the operation and maintenance of gas fields, gas plants, water processing and gas/water transmission pipelines (Origin - GIS Technical specification for Field Data Collection).

A collection of surface equipment and meters which facilitate the production, injection or disposition of products. This equipment supports any operation in the processing, development and transportation of products (PPDM).

Columns.Name: FacilityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Facility.

Columns.Name: FacilityName
Columns.Description: The business name of the Facility.

Columns.Name: FacilityDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the Facility.

Columns.Name: FacilityTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Facility Type.

Columns.Name: LocationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Location.

Columns.Name: FacilityTelephoneNumber
Columns.Description: The Facility telephone number.

Columns.Name: FacilityFaxNumber
Columns.Description: The Facility fax number.

Columns.Name: FacilityEmailAddress
Columns.Description: The Facility email address.

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: FacilityNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the facility.

Columns.Name: FacilityFirstOperationalDate
Columns.Description: The first date of operation of the facility.

Columns.Name: FacilityLastOperationalDate
Columns.Description: The last operation date of the facility.

Columns.Name: FacilityFirstFeasibilityStudyStarted
Columns.Description: The date that the facility feasibility study was started.

Columns.Name: FacilityFeasibilityStudyAcceptedDate
Columns.Description: The date that the facility feasibility study was accepted.

Columns.Name: FacilityPermitsAppliedDate
Columns.Description: The date that permits were applied for.

Columns.Name: FacilityPermitsReceivedDate
Columns.Description: The date that permits were applied received for operation.

Columns.Name: FacilityConstructionStartDate
Columns.Description: The date that Facility Construction started.

Columns.Name: FacilityConstructionCompletedDate
Columns.Description: The date that Facility Construction was completed.

Columns.Name: FacilityConstructionCostAmount
Columns.Description: The facility construction cost amount.

Columns.Name: FacilityFirstProductionDate
Columns.Description: The date of first production by the facility.

Columns.Name: FacilityLastProductionDate
Columns.Description: The date of last production by the facility.

Columns.Name: FacilityClosureDate
Columns.Description: The date that the facility was closed.

Columns.Name: DailyCapacityGpmPerDay
Columns.Description: The daily capacity in barrels per day of the facility.

Properties.Description:
A complex of buildings, equipment and supporting assets that fulfills a specific function or operation.

Note:
A facility is an above ground infrastructure associated with the operation and maintenance of gas fields, gas plants, water processing and gas/water transmission pipelines (Origin - GIS Technical specification for Field Data Collection).

A collection of surface equipment and meters which facilitate the production, injection or disposition of products. This equipment supports any operation in the processing, development and transportation of products (PPDM).
